    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Bone Magic](/Feats.aspx?ID=2401) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Lizardfolk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=226" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 45 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Your connection to your iruxi ancestors manifests as a simple primal spell that you cast using a fragment of an ancestor's bones. Choose one cantrip from the [primal spell list](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4). You can cast this cantrip as a primal innate spell at will, and it's heightened to a spell level equal to half your level rounded up.
name: Bone Magic
